name: Freedom Isn't Free
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 31 - December 2014

Survive the hordes of zombies, find the cash and buy your freedom!

Controls
WSAD = Movement
Left click = Shoot
Right click = Melee
1-3 = Change weapon
Q = Cycle weapon
F = Place flare
H = Help screen

Tips
Use flares to distract large groups of zombies
Melee weapons are a cost effective way to dispatch smaller groups of zombies, but try not to get cornered!
Health can be bought at the shop
Pressing 'H' at any time brings up the help menu and pauses the game

Source
https://github.com/Almax27/LD31-FreedomIsNotFree
